lead_paragraph: British Prime Minister Theresa May took aim at Scotland's ruling party on Friday, accusing nationalists of sacrificing not only the United Kingdom but also Scotland with its "obsession" with securing independence.
snippet: British Prime Minister Theresa May took aim at Scotland's ruling party on Friday, accusing nationalists of sacrificing not only the United Kingdom but also Scotland with its "obsession" with securing independence....

headline.main: PETA Condemns N.H.L.’s Use of Real Penguins in Pittsburgh Pregame Show
headline.print_headline: Activists Condemn the Use of Live Penguins
